com.blukii.infosdk

Interface BlukiiClient.OnDiscoveryListener

  • Enclosing class:
    BlukiiClient

    public static interface BlukiiClient.OnDiscoveryListener

    Callback interface for the BLE discovery.



    Discovery callbacks are registered by calling BlukiiClient.initDiscovery(OnDiscoveryListener).
    See Also:
    BlukiiClient.initDiscovery(OnDiscoveryListener), BlukiiClient.startDiscovery(), BlukiiClient.stopDiscovery()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDiscoveryResult(java.util.ArrayList<OutputElement> discoveryResultList)

      void onError(BlukiiClient.ErrorCode errorCode)

    • Method Detail

      • onDiscoveryResult

        void onDiscoveryResult(java.util.ArrayList<OutputElement> discoveryResultList)
        Will be called frequently after one scan duration for returning the scan results.

        If no BLE modules has been found discoveryResultList is an empty list (not null).

        If ResolveSettings.isResolveEnabled() is true but the blukii Info Manager is not accessible this callback will be called anyway with a discovery result OutputElement list but without ResolveData objects.
        In this case onError(com.blukii.infosdk.BlukiiClient.ErrorCode) will be called additionally.

        If the discovery failed because of an error onDiscoveryResult will not be called.
        Parameters:
        discoveryResultList - list of discovered OutputElements
        See Also:
        BlukiiClient.initDiscovery(OnDiscoveryListener), DiscoverySettings, ResolveSettings, ResolveSettings.isResolveEnabled()

      • onError

        void onError(BlukiiClient.ErrorCode errorCode)
        Will be called if discovery or resolver fail because of an error
        Parameters:
        errorCode - error code
        See Also:
        BlukiiClient.initDiscovery(OnDiscoveryListener)

      • onInfo

        void onInfo(BlukiiClient.InfoCode infoCode)
        Will be called for discovery state information
        Parameters:
        infoCode - info code
        See Also:
        BlukiiClient.initDiscovery(OnDiscoveryListener)

      • onInitialized

        void onInitialized(android.content.Context context)
        Will be called when the discovery service has finished initialization.
        Parameters:
        context - a valid context
        See Also:
        BlukiiClient.initDiscovery(OnDiscoveryListener)
